background: Commissioning editor for LRT’s factual and cultural output, focusing on youth, innovation and contemporary Lithuanian life. Encourages new voices and experimental storytelling.
thematic_priorities: Youth, innovation and digital life in Lithuania
content_not_wanted: Projects not accessible to younger or diverse audiences
technical_requirements: Broadcast standards; subtitles for wider reach
current_calls: Innovative formats with new Lithuanian voices
submission_process: Proposal with theme, audience and creative vision
name: Dovile Filmanavičiūtė
